ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OXA220]: Quick entry of documents to scan')

There is more than one matched row or no matched rows at all
There is only one matched row

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(count(*) as decimal(5,0)) from :1/scht where scht_admno= :2 and scht_clntno=:3 and scht_schtnocli=:4 and scht_scheddaterecv > ':5' for fetch only
